issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Copy BuilderUtil methods into individual records

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Migrate the factory method on map reduce side.
fields.summary: Migrate from using BuilderUtil factory methods to individual record factory method on MapReduce side

comments.body:
{color:red}-1 overall{color}.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12584590/MAPREDUCE-5270.1.patch
  against trunk revision .

    {color:green}+1 @author{color}.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    {color:green}+1 tests included{color}.  The patch appears to include 15 new or modified test files.

    {color:red}-1 javac{color:red}.  The patch appears to cause the build to fail.

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/3670//console

Checked this in to trunk and branch-2. Thanks Jian!

Integrated in Hadoop-trunk-Commit #3789 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/3789/])
    MAPREDUCE-5270. Migrated MR app from using BuilderUtil factory methods to individual record factory methods. Contributed by Jian He. (Revision 1486271)

     Result = SUCCESS
